Global

属性nodeStylenodeLabelStylenodeDelegationStyleedgeDelegationStyleedgeStyleedgeLabelStyleedgeLabelRectStyleanchorPointStyleanchorPointHoverStyleframeRectStylenodeControlPointStyleedgeControlPointStylenodeActivedBoxStyletreeButtonStyleautoZoomPaddingfontFamilytreeButtonStyletreeButtonRadiustreeButtonPadding

属性

nodeStyle

[Object] 默认节点样式

默认：

G6.Global.nodeStyle = {
  stroke: '#666',   
  fill: '#fff',
  lineWidth: 1,
  radius: 4,
  fillOpacity: 0.10
};

nodeLabelStyle

[Object] 节点文本样式

G6.Global.nodeLabelStyle = {
  fill: '#666',
  textAlign: 'center',
  textBaseline: 'middle',
  fontSize: 14
};

nodeDelegationStyle

[Object] 节点委托图形样式

默认：

G6.Global.nodeDelegationStyle = {
  stroke: '#108EE9',
  lineDash: [3, 3]
};

edgeDelegationStyle

[Object] 边委托图形样式

默认：

G6.Global.edgeDelegationStyle = {
  stroke: '#108EE9',
  lineDash: [3, 3]
};

edgeStyle

[Object] 边样式

默认：

G6.Global.edgeStyle = {
  lineWidth: 1,
  stroke: '#999'
};

edgeLabelStyle

[Object] 边文本样式

默认：

G6.Global.edgeLabelStyle = {
  fill: '#666',
  textAlign: 'center',
  textBaseline: 'middle'
};

edgeLabelRectStyle

[Object] 边底部背景矩形样式

默认：

G6.Global.edgeLabelRectStyle = {
    fill: 'white'
};

anchorPointStyle

[Object] 锚点样式

默认：

G6.Global.anchorPointStyle = {
  fill: '#108EE9',
  lineWidth: 0.1,
  r: 4
};

anchorPointHoverStyle

[Object] 锚点悬浮样式

默认：

G6.Global.anchorPointHoverStyle = {
  lineWidth: 6,
  stroke: '#108EE9',
  strokeOpacity: 0.2
};

frameRectStyle

[Object] 多选框样式

默认：

G6.Global.frameRectStyle = {
  fill: 'blue',
  opacity: 0.1
};

nodeControlPointStyle

[Object] 节点控制点样式

默认：

G6.Global.nodeControlPointStyle = {
  r: 4,
  fill: '#fff',
  shadowBlur: 4,
  shadowColor: '#666'
};

edgeControlPointStyle

[Object] 边控制点样式

默认：

G6.Global.edgeControlPointStyle = {
  r: 4,
  fill: '#fff',
  shadowBlur: 4,
  shadowColor: '#666'
};

nodeActivedBoxStyle

[Object] 节点激活框样式

默认：

G6.Global.nodeActivedBoxStyle = {
  stroke: '#108EE9',
  lineDash: [3, 3]
};

treeButtonStyle

[Object] 树图展开折叠 icon 样式

默认：

G6.Global.treeButtonStyle = {
  fill: '#fff',
  stroke: '#333'
};

autoZoomPadding

[Number] 自动缩放边距

G6.Global.autoZoomPadding = 10;

fontFamily

[String] 字体家族

G6.Global.fontFamily = '"Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, "PingFang SC", "Hiragino Sans GB", "Microsoft YaHei", "微软雅黑", SimSun, "sans-serif"';

treeButtonStyle

[Object] 树图展开折叠 icon 的样式

G6.Global.treeButtonStyle = {
  fill: '#fff',
  stroke: '#333'
}

treeButtonRadius

[Number] 树图按钮半径

G6.Global.treeButtonRadius = 6;

treeButtonPadding

[Number] 树图按钮内边距

G6.Global.treeButtonPadding = 3;
Canvas Util
